name: CalmingSounds
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calming sounds
des:
Relax to some calming sounds.

Listen to Calming Sounds by adding to a Daily Routine. To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:

On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills" > Select Calming Sounds
Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
